issue.title: [Plasma] Remove fatal error when plasma client calls get on an unsealed object that it created.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3558](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3558). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the case when Get is called with a timeout, this should simply behave as if the object hasn't been created yet.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3558?focusedCommentId=16657348) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2791
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2791>
